page.description: returns the last "word" in a string
page.syntax: Word as C = lastword(C string [,C separator ])

argument.name: lastword
argument.description: The last word of the string. Character

argument.name: string
argument.description: A string with multiple words or entries separated by a delimiter.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: Optional. Default = " ". The delimiter that separates the words or entries. Character

page.discussion: The LASTWORD() function returns the last word or entry in a string.
page.example: dim s1 as C dim s2 as C s1 = "one two three four" s2 = "one" + crlf() + "two" + crlf() + "three" + crlf() + "four" ? lastword(s1, " ") = "four" ? lastword(s2, crlf() ) = "four"
